title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Effective Online Education Design Through Science Learning Visualization

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can visually represent the structure of science curricula using course architecture diagrams.
Learners can derive at least three strengths and areas for improvement in existing instructional designs through diagram analysis.
Learners can revise course architecture diagrams based on peer feedback and propose optimized learning designs.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
